snippet: During a performance, the pop star described the three women who are being tried on hooliganism charges as courageous over their “punk prayer” directed at now-President Vladimir V. Putin.
abstract: Madonna uses a Moscow concert to voice support for Maria Alyokhina, Yekaterina Samutsevich and Nadezhda Tolokonnikova, three women from Pussy Riot a feminist punk band who are being tried on hooliganism charges after their 'punk prayer' directed at now-President Vladimir V Putin.

byline.contributor: Andrew Roth and Nikolay Khalip contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: During a performance, the pop star described the three women who are being tried on hooliganism charges as courageous over their “punk prayer” directed at now-President Vladimir V. Putin.

headline.seo: Madonna Defends Pussy Riot at Moscow Concert
headline.main: In Russia, Madonna Defends a Band’s Anti-Putin Stunt
headline.print_headline: In Russia, Madonna Defends a Band’s Anti-Putin Stunt
